summary: At a Mexican ranch, fugitive O'Malley and pursuing Sheriff Stribling agree to help rancher Breckenridge drive his herd into Texas where Stribling could legally arrest O'Malley, but Breckenridge's wife complicates things.
cast: Rock Hudson|Kirk Douglas|Dorothy Malone|Joseph Cotten|Carol Lynley|Neville Brand|Regis Toomey|James Westmoreland|Adam Williams|Jack Elam|John Shay|José Chávez|Peter Helm|Jackboy|Margarito Luna|José Torvay|Jorge Treviño|Manuel Vergara 'Manver'
title: El último atardecer
